trans-unit.source: FXLabel (on github) does this out of the box by setting label.contentMode to UIViewContentModeTop. This component is not made by me, but it is a component I use frequently and has tons of features, and seems to work well.
trans-unit.target: FXLabel（在github上）通过将 label.contentMode 设置为 UIViewContentModeTop 来做到这一点。该组件不是我自己制作的，但它是我经常使用的组件，并且具有大量功能，并且似乎运行良好。

trans-unit.source: My Original Answer (for posterity/reference):
trans-unit.target: 我的原始答案（供后代参考）：

trans-unit.source: No muss, no Objective-c, no fuss but Swift 3:
trans-unit.target: 没有混乱，没有Objective-c，没有大惊小怪，但雨燕3：

trans-unit.source: No muss, no fuss
trans-unit.target: 没有糊涂，没有大惊小怪

trans-unit.source: Swift 4.2
trans-unit.target: 斯威夫特4.2

trans-unit.source: This is an old solution, use the autolayout on iOS >= 6
trans-unit.target: 这是一个旧的解决方案，请在iOS> = 6上使用自动布局

trans-unit.source: Additional space is needed in every added newline, because iPhone UILabels' trailing carriage returns seems to be ignored :(
trans-unit.target: 每个添加的换行符都需要额外的空间，因为iPhone UILabels 的尾随回车符似乎被忽略了:(

trans-unit.source: Adjusting UILabel LefMargin, RightMargin and Top Margin Constraints.
trans-unit.target: 调整UILabel的LefMargin、RightMargin和Top Margin约束。

trans-unit.source: Also, my label has word wrapping enabled.
trans-unit.target: 另外,我的标签有文字包装功能。

trans-unit.source: An even quicker (and dirtier) way to accomplish this is by setting the UILabel's line break mode to "Clip" and adding a fixed amount of newlines.
trans-unit.target: 一个更快(也更脏的)方法是将UILabel的断行模式设置为 "Clip "并添加固定数量的新行。

trans-unit.source: And then to use, put your text into the label, and then call the appropriate method to align it:
trans-unit.target: 然后要使用,把你的文字放入标签中,然后调用相应的方法进行对齐。

trans-unit.source: And then when I wanted to change the text of my label...
trans-unit.target: 然后当我想改变我的标签文字时......

trans-unit.source: As discussed here.
trans-unit.target: 正如这里所讨论的。

trans-unit.source: As long as you are not doing any complex task, you can use UITextView instead of UILabels.
trans-unit.target: 只要您不执行任何复杂的任务，就可以使用 UITextView 代替 UILabels 。

trans-unit.source: Auto layout makes this issue pretty trivial. Assuming we're adding the label to UIView *view, the following code will accomplish this:
trans-unit.target: 自动布局使此问题变得微不足道。假设我们将标签添加到 UIView *view ，下面的代码将完成此操作：

trans-unit.source: Call sizeToFit on your label
trans-unit.target: 在标签上调用 sizeToFit

trans-unit.source: Call sizeToFit to reduce the frame size so the contents just fit:
trans-unit.target: 调用 sizeToFit 减小帧大小，以便内容恰好适合：

trans-unit.source: Change Content Compression Resistance Priority For Vertical=1000` So that Vertical>Horizontal .
trans-unit.target: 更改 Content Compression Resistance Priority For Vertical = 1000`的内容压缩阻力优先级，以使“垂直”>“水平”。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个新班级

trans-unit.target: 创建一个UILabel的子类。效果很好。

trans-unit.target: 禁用卷轴。

trans-unit.source: For Adaptive UI(iOS8 or after) , Vertical Alignment of UILabel is to be set from StoryBoard by Changing the properties noOfLines=0` and
trans-unit.target: 对于自适应UI（iOS8或更高版本），可通过更改属性 noOfLines = 0`和从StoryBoard设置UILabel的垂直对齐

trans-unit.target: 在这里，我使用了另一种解决方法，只需将换行符填充到label的末尾（请注意，我实际上继承了 UILabel ，但这不是必需的）：

trans-unit.source: Hope that helps someone!
trans-unit.target: 希望对大家有帮助!

trans-unit.source: How do I vertically align the text to always be at the top of the UILabel?
trans-unit.target: 如何垂直对齐文本以使其始终位于 UILabel 的顶部？

trans-unit.source: However, in some cases we do want the label to occupy all those spaces, even if the label does have so much text (e.g. multiple rows with equal height).
trans-unit.target: 然而,在某些情况下,我们确实希望标签能占据所有这些空间,即使标签确实有那么多的文字(例如,多行高度相等的行)。

trans-unit.source: I also wrote it on my blog as an article: http://fstoke.me/blog/?p=2819
trans-unit.target: 我也将其写在博客上作为文章：http : //fstoke.me/blog/?p=2819

trans-unit.source: I have a UILabel with space for two lines of text. Sometimes, when the text is too short, this text is displayed in the vertical center of the label.
trans-unit.target: 我有一个 UILabel ,带有两行文本的空间。有时，当文本太短时，该文本会显示在标签的垂直中心。

trans-unit.source: I took a while to read the code, as well as the code in the introduced page, and found that they all try to modify the frame size of label, so that the default center vertical alignment would not appear.
trans-unit.target: 我花了一段时间看了一下代码,以及介绍页面中的代码,发现它们都尝试着修改标签的框架大小,这样默认的中心垂直对齐就不会出现了。

trans-unit.source: I took the suggestions here and created a view which can wrap a UILabel and will size it and set the number of lines so that it is top aligned. Simply put a UILabel as a subview:
trans-unit.target: 我采纳了这里的建议,创建了一个视图,它可以包裹一个UILabel,并将它的大小和行数设置为顶部对齐。简单的把一个UILabel作为一个子视图。

trans-unit.source: I tried the solution involving newline padding and ran into incorrect behavior in some cases. In my experience, it's easier to constrain the drawing rect as above than mess with numberOfLines.
trans-unit.target: 我尝试了涉及换行符填充的解决方案，在某些情况下遇到了不正确的行为。以我的经验，比起用 numberOfLines 搞乱，约束如上所述的rect更容易。

trans-unit.source: I wanted to have a label which was able to have multi-lines, a minimum font size, and centred both horizontally and vertically in it's parent view. I added my label programmatically to my view:
trans-unit.target: 我希望有一个标签可以有多行,最小的字体大小,并且在父视图中的水平和垂直方向上都能居中。我在视图中添加了我的标签。

trans-unit.source: I wrote a util function to achieve this purpose. You can take a look:
trans-unit.target: 为了实现这个目的,我写了一个util函数。大家可以看一看。

trans-unit.source: I'll make my label in code so that you can see what's going on. You can set up most of this in Interface Builder too. My setup is a View-Based App with a background image I made in Photoshop to show margins (20 points). The label is an attractive orange color so you can see what's going on with the dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 我会在代码中做我的标签,这样你就可以看到是怎么回事了。你也可以在界面生成器中设置大部分。我的设置是一个基于视图的App,背景图片是我在Photoshop中制作的,以显示边距(20分)。标签是一个诱人的橙色,这样你就可以看清尺寸是怎么回事了。

trans-unit.source: I've found the answers on this question are now a bit out-of-date, so adding this for the auto layout fans out there.
trans-unit.target: 我发现这个问题的答案现在已经有点过时了,所以在这里补充一下,给外面的自动排版爱好者们补充一下。

trans-unit.source: I've struggled with this one for a long time and I wanted to share my solution.
trans-unit.target: 这个问题我纠结了很久,想分享一下我的解决办法。

trans-unit.source: I've used a lot of the methods above, and just want to add a quick-and-dirty approach I've used:
trans-unit.target: 上面的方法我已经用了很多,只是想补充一个我用过的速成方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using autolayout, set the vertical contentHuggingPriority to 1000, either in code or IB. In IB you may then have to remove a height constraint by setting it's priority to 1 and then deleting it.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的是autolayout,请在代码或IB中将垂直内容拥抱优先级设置为1000。在IB中,你可能需要将高度限制设置为1,然后删除它。

trans-unit.source: If you do switch to using UITextView, you can turn off all the Scroll View properties as well as User Interaction Enabled... This will force it to act more like a label.
trans-unit.target: 如果确实切换为使用 UITextView ，则可以关闭所有“滚动视图”属性以及“启用用户交互” ...这将迫使它的行为更像一个标签。

trans-unit.source: If you have a label with longer text that will make more than one line, set numberOfLines to 0 (zero here means an unlimited number of lines).
trans-unit.target: 如果您有一个带有较长文本的标签，该标签将包含多行，则将 numberOfLines 设置为 0 （此处为零表示行数不受限制）。

trans-unit.source: If you want the text to be displayed completely just user sizeToFit and sizeThatFits: methods
trans-unit.target: 如果要完全显示文本，则只需使用用户 sizeToFit 和 sizeThatFits: 方法

trans-unit.source: If your label is included in a nib or storyboard as a subview of the view of a ViewController that uses autolayout, then putting your sizeToFit call into viewDidLoad won't work, because autolayout sizes and positions the subviews after viewDidLoad is called and will immediately undo the effects of your sizeToFit call. However, calling sizeToFit from within viewDidLayoutSubviewswill work.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的标签被包括在笔尖或故事板作为一个子视图 view 一个视图控制器的使用自动版式，然后把你的 sizeToFit 电话到 viewDidLoad 中是行不通的，因为自动布局大小和位置后子视图 viewDidLoad 中被调用，将立即撤销您的 sizeToFit 调用的效果。但是，调用 sizeToFit 从内部 viewDidLayoutSubviews 会工作。

trans-unit.source: In Interface Builder
trans-unit.target: 在界面生成器中

trans-unit.source: In swift,
trans-unit.target: 在迅速的。

trans-unit.source: In your code
trans-unit.target: 在你的代码中

trans-unit.source: Instead of UILabel you may use UITextField which has vertical alignment option:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用具有垂直对齐选项的 UITextField 代替 UILabel ：

trans-unit.source: Just in case it's of any help to anyone, I had the same problem but was able to solve the issue simply by switching from using UILabel to using UITextView. I appreciate this isn't for everyone because the functionality is a bit different.
trans-unit.target: 以防万一，这对任何人都有帮助，我遇到了同样的问题，但是仅通过从使用 UILabel 切换到使用 UITextView 就能解决此问题。我很欣赏这并不适合每个人，因为功能有些不同。

trans-unit.source: LabelTopAlign
trans-unit.target: LabelTopAlign

trans-unit.source: Like the answer above, but it wasn't quite right, or easy to slap into code so I cleaned it up a bit. Add this extension either to it's own .h and .m file or just paste right above the implementation you intend to use it:
trans-unit.target: 就像上面的答案一样,但是它不太正确,也不太容易插入代码,所以我把它清理了一下。将这个扩展名添加到它自己的.h和.m文件中,或者直接粘贴在你打算使用它的实现上面。

trans-unit.source: Make sure the number of newlines in the string will cause any text to fill the available vertical space, and set the UILabel to truncate any overflowing text.
trans-unit.target: 确保字符串中的新行数会导致任何文本填满可用的垂直空间,并设置UILabel截断任何溢出的文本。

trans-unit.source: My solution:
trans-unit.target: 我的解决办法是:

trans-unit.source: Note that sizeToFit will respect your initial label's minimum width. If you start with a label 100 wide and call sizeToFit on it, it will give you back a (possibly very tall) label with 100 (or a little less) width. You might want to set your label to the minimum width you want before resizing.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， sizeToFit 将遵守您初始标签的最小宽度。如果您以宽度为100的标签开始，并在其上调用 sizeToFit ，它将返回宽度为100（或更小）的（可能非常高）标签。您可能需要在调整大小之前将标签设置为所需的最小宽度。

trans-unit.source: P.S. You can imagine easily supporting UIViewContentMode this way:
trans-unit.target: P.S.S.你可以想象一下,用这种方式来支持UIViewContentMode。

trans-unit.source: Refering to the extension solution:
trans-unit.target: 指的是延伸解决方案。

trans-unit.source: Resize the frame for the label using the text you want to insert. That way you can accommodate any number of lines.
trans-unit.target: 使用你要插入的文字来调整标签的框架大小。这样,你可以容纳任何数量的行数。

trans-unit.source: Set Lines to '0' in Attributes Inspector
trans-unit.target: 在属性检查器中将 Lines 设置为“ 0”

trans-unit.source: Set UILabel to size of biggest possible Text
trans-unit.target: 将 UILabel 设置为最大可能的文本大小

trans-unit.source: Set the maximum number of lines to 0 (automatic):
trans-unit.target: 将 maximum number 行数设置为0（自动）：

trans-unit.source: Set the frame of the label to the maximum size:
trans-unit.target: 将标签的框架设置为最大尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Set the new text:
trans-unit.target: 设置新的文字。

trans-unit.source: Set the text of the label
trans-unit.target: 设置标签的文字

trans-unit.source: Similarly, alignBottom should be updated too with a @" \n@%" in place of "\n@%" (for cycle initialization must be replaced by "for(int i=0..." too).
trans-unit.target: 同样，也应使用 @" \n@%" 代替 "\n@%" 来更新alignBottom （对于循环初始化，也必须用“ for（int i = 0 ...”）代替。

trans-unit.source: Some limitations of using sizeToFit come into play with center- or right-aligned text. Here's what happens:
trans-unit.target: 使用 sizeToFit 的一些限制会影响居中对齐或右对齐的文本。这是发生了什么：

trans-unit.source: Some other things to note:
trans-unit.target: 其他一些需要注意的事情:

trans-unit.source: Split lines by myself (ignoring label wrap settings)
trans-unit.target: 自己分线(忽略了标签包装的设置

trans-unit.source: Subclass UILabel and constrain the drawing rectangle, like this:
trans-unit.target: 子类UILabel并约束绘图矩形,就像这样。

trans-unit.source: The following extension works for me:
trans-unit.target: 下面的扩展程序对我来说是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The label is still sized with a fixed top-left corner. You can save the original label's width in a variable and set it after sizeToFit, or give it a fixed width to counter these problems:
trans-unit.target: 标签的大小仍带有固定的左上角。您可以将原始标签的宽度保存在一个变量中，并在 sizeToFit 之后进行设置，或者给它固定的宽度以解决以下问题：

trans-unit.source: The label's height will be calculated automatically (using it's intrinsicContentSize) and the label will be positioned edge-to-edge horizontally, at the top of the view.
trans-unit.target: 标签的高度将自动计算（使用它的 intrinsicContentSize ），并且标签将在 view 的顶部水平边对边放置。

trans-unit.source: The labels frame is now just high and wide enough to fit your text. The top left should be unchanged. I have tested this only with the top left-aligned text. For other alignments, you might have to modify the frame afterward.
trans-unit.target: 现在的标签边框刚好高和宽,可以容纳你的文字。左上角应该是不变的。我只对左上方对齐的文字进行了测试。对于其他对齐方式,你可能需要在之后修改框架。

trans-unit.source: Then call [yourLabel alignTop]; or [yourLabel alignBottom]; after each yourLabel text assignment.
trans-unit.target: 然后调用 [yourLabel alignTop]; 或 [yourLabel alignBottom]; 在每次yourLabel文本分配之后。

trans-unit.source: There's no way to set the vertical-align on a UILabel, but you can get the same effect by changing the label's frame. I've made my labels orange so you can see clearly what's happening.
trans-unit.target: 无法在 UILabel 上设置垂直对齐，但是您可以通过更改标签的框架来获得相同的效果。我将标签设为橙色，以便您可以清楚地看到发生了什么。

trans-unit.source: This solution won't work for everyone -- in particular, if you still want to show "..." at the end of your string if it exceeds the number of lines you're showing, you'll need to use one of the longer bits of code -- but for a lot of cases this'll get you what you need.
trans-unit.target: 这个解决方案并不适合每个人 --特别是,如果你还想在字符串的末尾显示"...",如果它超过了你要显示的行数,你就需要使用较长的代码之一 --但对于很多情况下,这将会满足你的需求。

trans-unit.source: This uses the NSString method sizeWithFont:constrainedToSize:lineBreakMode: to calculate the frame height needed to fit a string, then sets the origin and width.
trans-unit.target: 这使用 NSString 方法 sizeWithFont:constrainedToSize:lineBreakMode: 计算适合字符串的框架高度，然后设置原点和宽度。

trans-unit.source: This will give you a UILabel that will autoshrink text down to 0.5 scales and vertically center the text. These options are also available in Storyboard/IB.
trans-unit.target: 这将为您提供一个 UILabel ，它将文本自动缩小至0.5比例并垂直居中。这些选项在Storyboard / IB中也可用。

trans-unit.source: To make your font of label to fit to the width of screen or specific width size.
trans-unit.target: 要使你的标签字体适合屏幕的宽度或特定的宽度尺寸。

trans-unit.source: To make your text of your Label to fit to screen and it's on the top
trans-unit.target: 要使你的Label的文字适合于屏幕,它在顶部

trans-unit.source: Use textRect(forBounds:limitedToNumberOfLines:).
trans-unit.target: 使用 textRect(forBounds:limitedToNumberOfLines:) 。

trans-unit.source: Vertically align text to top within a UILabel
trans-unit.target: 将文本垂直对齐到UILabel中的顶部。

trans-unit.source: What I did in my app was to set the UILabel's line property to 0 as well as to create a bottom constraint of the UILabel and make sure it is being set to >= 0 as shown in the image below.
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">我在应用程序中所做的是将UILabel的line属性设置为0，并创建UILabel的底部约束，并确保将其设置为> = 0，如下图所示。</font></font>

trans-unit.source: Whether lineBreakMode is respected depends on how it's set. NSLineBreakByTruncatingTail (the default) is ignored after sizeToFit, as are the other two truncation modes (head and middle). NSLineBreakByClipping is also ignored. NSLineBreakByCharWrapping works as usual. The frame width is still narrowed to fit to the rightmost letter.
trans-unit.target: 是否尊重 lineBreakMode 取决于其设置方式。 NSLineBreakByTruncatingTail （默认值）后，被忽略 sizeToFit ，因为是其他两个截断模式（头和中间）。 NSLineBreakByClipping 也将被忽略。 NSLineBreakByCharWrapping 照常工作。框架宽度仍变窄以适合最右边的字母。

trans-unit.source: You can use TTTAttributedLabel, it supports vertical alignment.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用TTTAttributedLabel，它支持垂直对齐。

trans-unit.source: and some textAlignment for label :
trans-unit.target: 和一些textAlignment for label。

trans-unit.source: and the following constraints are enough to achieve the desired results.
trans-unit.target: 和以下制约因素就足以达到预期的效果。

trans-unit.source: for anyone reading this because the text inside your label is not vertically centered, keep in mind that some font types are not designed equally. for example, if you create a label with zapfino size 16, you will see the text is not perfectly centered vertically.
trans-unit.target: 对于那些因为标签内的文字没有垂直居中而阅读这篇文章的人来说,请记住,有些字体类型的设计是不一样的。

trans-unit.source: however, working with helvetica will vertically center your text.
trans-unit.target: 但是,使用 helvetica 会让你的文字垂直居中。

trans-unit.source: or
trans-unit.target: or

trans-unit.source: should be replaced by
trans-unit.target: 应改为

trans-unit.source: ．How to use? (If lblHello is created by Interface builder, so I skip some UILabel attributes detail)
trans-unit.target: 如何使用?(如果lblHello是由接口构建器创建的,所以我跳过了一些UILabel的属性细节)
